definitions.definition: a person who derives advantage from something, especially a trust, will, or life insurance policy.
examples: heir, heiress, inheritor, legatee; Morerecipient, receiver, payee, donee, assignee; devisee, grantee "her beneficiaries include several godchildren"Morerecipient, receiver, payee, donee, assignee; devisee, grantee her beneficiaries include several godchildren
